recipes.label: Trade Stories with The Veiled Lady
recipes.startdescription: "Trade stories? Always. It is the best way to travel without leaving any comfort behind."
recipes.description: She walks over to a shrine, and lights an insence stick amids cuttings of jasmine, lilies and lotusses. " I will tell you a story I learned in my second home. Maybe the secret contained within it will help you as much as it did me."
